text: Half Hour of Power is Sum 41's debut EP. Despite its title, there are only 24 minutes of music on it. It was released on June 27, 2000 on Big Rig Records, a subsidiary of Island Records (US), and Aquarius Records (Canada). == Track listing == # "Grab the Devil by the Horns and **** Him Up the ***" - 1:06 # "Machine Gun" – 2:29 # "What I Believe" – 2:49 # "T.H.T.
